it.polimi.se2018.view

Interface ViewInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLI, GUI

    public interface ViewInterface
    This is the interface implemented by CLI and GUI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void askPattern(PatternRequest message)
      Display pool of board for the user to select from, and after the selection send a `PatternResponse` message to the Server
      void displayConnectionError(java.lang.Exception e)
      Display a connection error message

      If connection was not rejected, make the view progress to the next phase

      Make the view progress to the "match phase".
      void resetTimer()
      Reset in-game timer visualization

    • Method Detail

      • displayToolcardActivationResponse

        void displayToolcardActivationResponse(boolean isOk)
        Display toolcard activation response
        Parameters:
        isOk - False if the activation was rejected, true otherwise

      • updateMatch

        void updateMatch(Match match)
        Update match state in view. This will also handle the state change
        Parameters:
        match - new match state

      • onConnect

        void onConnect(boolean isOk)
        If connection was not rejected, make the view progress to the next phase
        Parameters:
        isOk - False if connection was rejected

      • displayConnectionError

        void displayConnectionError(java.lang.Exception e)
        Display a connection error message
        Parameters:
        e - Thrown exception

      • onMatchStart

        void onMatchStart(Match match,
                  int timerValue)
        Make the view progress to the "match phase". This will initialize every component needed, based on the informations in Match. This will also initialize the in-game timer visualization
        Parameters:
        match - Initial match state
        timerValue - Initial timer value

      • askPattern

        void askPattern(PatternRequest message)
        Display pool of board for the user to select from, and after the selection send a `PatternResponse` message to the Server
        Parameters:
        message - Message containing the board pool and infos

      • displayUndoMessage

        void displayUndoMessage(UndoResponse message)
        Display undo response
        Parameters:
        message - Response message

      • resetTimer

        void resetTimer()
        Reset in-game timer visualization
